name: Sapphire and Diamond Earrings
shortDescription: Gorgeous earrings featuring sapphires and diamonds set in 14K yellow gold, perfect for elegant evenings
fullDescription: These stunning earrings showcase a vivid blue sapphire complemented by sparkling round diamonds. Crafted in 14K yellow gold, they offer a timeless look suitable for any occasion. The intricate design and exquisite craftsmanship make these earrings a standout addition to your jewelry collection.
